metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1899 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: The unserialize() function supported a type code, "S", which was meant to be supported only for APC serialization. This type code allowed arbitrary memory addresses to be accessed as if they were static StringData objects. This issue affected HHVM prior to v4.32.3, between versions 4.33.0 and 4.56.0, 4.57.0, 4.58.0, 4.58.1, 4.59.0, 4.60.0, 4.61.0, 4.62.0.

criterions.comment: hhvm package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
